hero.title: We create, develop and manage digital products.
hero.subtitle: We boost your business through technology, developing exclusive digital solutions for your enterprise.

awardsSection.title: Awards
awardsSection.subtitle: Recognition of a lot of work

ServicesSection.title: services
ServicesSection.subtitle: The ideal solution for your digital business

item.title: Applications
item.subtitle: We build custom applications for your enterprise, exclusive solutions for Android and IOS devices.

item.title: Web Sites
item.subtitle: We create and update your website with a customized design and attractive elements, always thinking about establishing your company's presence on the internet.

item.title: Web platforms
item.subtitle: We develop web systems to automate and facilitate your company's functions and processes, bringing a competitive advantage to your business.

methodSection.title: Methodology
methodSection.subtitle: We provide an agile process to develop your solution:

method01.title: Exploratory Meeting
method01.description: Here we fully understand your need by raising solutions and questions to guide the next stages of the project, always aiming to create the best solution for your business

method02.title: Design creation
method02.description: We create a unique look for your solution, always aiming to transmit your business in your software. In this step we carry out the interface design, thinking about the harmony of the elements and the best experience for your user.

method03.title: Development
method03.description: Here you follow closely everything that is being done, bringing the client into the development process and always validating with him the steps for the next steps

method04.title: Delivery and Feedback
method04.description: Voila! Your project is ready to go live.

item.title: Leitor Pauteiro
item.description: The tariff reader is a platform developed for the Correio da Bahia newspaper, where its readers can send news suggestions or make complaints directly to the newspaper's editorial staff through a chatbot to Rosa. This project was part of Future Mail of the Year Award 2019

item.title: Data And Nutrition
item.description: Data And Nutrition is a platform used in hospitals for nutritional management of inpatients, helping to combat hospital malnutrition and providing continuous monitoring of the status of inmates.

item.title: Dizziness App
item.description: Application used as an auxiliary tool to combat dizziness and labyrinthitis. The Dizziness App was created with the purpose of assisting specialists in audiology and speech therapists in the process of treating patients, making them gain resistance to circumstances that cause discomfort. .

item.name: Nilson
item.comments: I always like to work with the class. They always do a good job and things work well.

item.name: Juan Torres
item.role: (Innovation Coordinator Correio da Bahia) - Leitor Pauteiro
item.comments: The project met expectations for a very simple reason, which is crucial for an innovation work process: the final product has all the attributes that were promised at the beginning of the work.

item.name: Glória Canto
item.comments: The application has brought important results to my patients helping them in their recovery. I use it every day in my office, an excellent job!
